headline: Tracking the Evolving FedEx Story as Analysts Rework the Narrative
summary: FedEx's implied fair value has nudged higher to about $275.14 per share as analysts recalibrate their expectations around the company’s execution and demand backdrop. A slightly lower discount rate and a marginal trim to revenue growth forecasts reflect a market that is still constructive, but more measured on freight and macro risks. Stay tuned to see how you can track these shifting assumptions and keep up with the evolving narrative around FedEx stock. Stay updated as the Fair Value for...
